attributes.name: department
attributes.description: The department the person is part of, e.g. accounting.

attributes.name: firstName
attributes.description: The first (given) name of the person.

attributes.name: lastName
attributes.description: The last (family) name of the person.

attributes.name: roleResponsibility
attributes.description: The person's functional role or primary responsibility, e.g. accounts payable.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the person, e.g. accounting manager.

attributes.name: userActiveModifiedDate
attributes.description: The date of user activation or termination.

attributes.name: userActiveStatus
attributes.description: The status of users (for identification of transactions by inactive users). Can be a Boolean flag or text to indicate 'active' or 'inactive' or similar

attributes.name: userDefined1
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userDefined2
attributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

attributes.name: userId
attributes.description: A unique identifier of individuals entering transactions into the ERP system. This field is used to join information in this table to other tables based on the fields EnteredBy, LastModifiedBy, and ApprovedBy.
